sections.title: Measuring Proximity in FTC
sections.content: Distance sensors measure how far away an object is, using infrared or ultrasonic technology. They are useful for obstacle detection, alignment, and autonomous navigation.

sections.title: Distance Sensor Facts
sections.subtitle: How they work
items: Return distance in centimeters or inches
Can detect walls, game elements, or other robots

sections.title: Distance Sensor Example
sections.code:
DistanceSensor dist = hardwareMap.get(DistanceSensor.class, "dist");
double distance = dist.getDistance(DistanceUnit.CM);

sections.title: Mounting and Testing
sections.content: Mount distance sensors securely and test their range and accuracy in your environment.
